name: Koffing
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby.

abilities.name: Blow-Away Bomb
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you discard this Pokémon with the effect of Roxie, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Place damage counters after the effect of Roxie.)

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
